info.title: Pappers API
info.description: The Pappers API allows you to retrieve information and documents on French companies from their SIREN or SIRET number. You must indicate your API key in the requests, using the `api_token` parameter. The access URL to the API is https://api.pappers.fr/v1/. The history of modifications (changelog) is accessible at the following url: https://www.pappers.fr/api/changelog

get.summary: Retrieves all the information available on a company.
get.description: You must provide either the SIREN or the SIRET. If you indicate the SIREN, all the establishments associated with this SIREN will be returned in the key `establishments`. If you indicate the SIRET, only the associated establishment will be returned in the key `establishment`.

200.description: Company found. The return contains an object describing the company.

get.description: All parameters are optional and are used to filter the search. The different companies will be returned in a `companies` table.

parameters.name: par_page
parameters.description: Number of results displayed on a page.

parameters.name: nom_entreprise
parameters.description: Name of the company to search. This corresponds to the name of the company for a legal entity, and the first and last name for a natural person.

parameters.name: departement
parameters.description: Department number of one of the company's establishments.

parameters.name: code_postal
parameters.description: Postal code of one of the company's establishments.

parameters.name: categorie_juridique
parameters.description: Legal category of the company, according to the [Insee nomenclature].(https://www.insee.fr/fr/information/2028129).

parameters.name: entreprise_cessee
parameters.description: Activity of the company ceased or not.

parameters.name: chiffre_affaires_min
parameters.description:
Minimum turnover of the company.
**Note** : Filtering on this criterion restricts enormously the returned companies because it eliminates automatically all the companies whose accounts are not published.

parameters.name: chiffre_affaires_max
parameters.description:
Maximum turnover of the company.
**Note** : Filtering on this criterion restricts enormously the returned companies because it eliminates automatically all the companies whose accounts are not published.

parameters.name: resultat_min
parameters.description:
Minimum result of the company.
**Note** : Filtering on this criterion restricts enormously the returned companies because it eliminates automatically all the companies whose accounts are not published.

parameters.name: resultat_max
parameters.description:
Maximum result of the company.
**Note** : Filtering on this criterion restricts enormously the returned companies because it eliminates automatically all the companies whose accounts are not published.

parameters.name: date_creation_min
parameters.description: Minimum creation date of the company, in DD-MM-YYYY format.

parameters.name: date_creation_max
parameters.description: Maximum creation date of the company, in DD-MM-YYYY format.

parameters.name: tranche_effectif_min
parameters.description: Minimum workforce level of the company, according to the [Sirene nomenclature].(https://www.sirene.fr/sirene/public/variable/tefen#:~:text=Cette%20variable%20correspond%20%C3%A0%20la,effectif%20salari%C3%A9%20de%20l'entreprise.).

parameters.name: tranche_effectif_max
parameters.description: Maximum workforce level of the company, according to the [Sirene nomenclature].(https://www.sirene.fr/sirene/public/variable/tefen#:~:text=Cette%20variable%20correspond%20%C3%A0%20la,effectif%20salari%C3%A9%20de%20l'entreprise.).

200.description: Successful search. The return contains a list of companies that meet the specified criteria.

404.description: There are no companies that meet the criteria listed.
